Heres the review of what happend to me in the year 2004, since its about to be 2005.

[January]: This was the month I started losing interest in WWE(pro wrestling). I had been a huge WWE fan since 1999, at this point I started to lose interest in it.

[Febuary]: This month I was having a ton of problems with my ex girlfriend (alex). Lots of fighting about different things, I tried to hold it together. But time would prove more powerful.

[March]: I totally stopped watching WWE by now. All my daily attention wask keeping Alex and myself together.

[April]: This month I went to Niagra Falls, Canada with my brother whose in the Marines and is stationed in northern New York.

[May]: This was the last month I had a mohawk. My mohawk was red and blue! This is also the month I broke up with my 6 month long girlfriend, Alex. I went through about 4 days of depression. Plus an extra 5 days of recovering. After that...I felt so independant and powerful. It was pretty cool. I didnt feel no pressure to try and be perfect anymore.

[June]: Well lets see, I finished 10th grade. I went to ROTC SLS. I started hanging out with Kate, Mary, and Brian 98% of the time. Good month.

[July]: July is when Kate, Mary, Amanda, and I would hang out even more. Brian moved. Joe was never home. We would go to the bike trail alot this month. Fourth of July came and went.

[August]: Brian visited once during this month. Myself,Amanda, Kate, and Mary went to the bike trail alot. I turned 17. I wanted summer to last longer.

[September]: I went back to school. Mary, Kate, and I went on the bike trail and wound up in Glassboro.

[October]: I started to go out with Kristin. I was already tired of school. This was basically a boring month. Halloween was cool.

[November]: Started to get chilli this month. I spent most of my time online. George Bush won the election. I wanted John Kerry to win.

[December]: I didnt feel any kind of connection between Kristen and I, so I decided we should brake up, and we did. I hung out with Janna for the first time. I got my drivers permit. I baked alot of cookies. It was Christmas and I got the OC DVD set for Season 1.
